tag.desc: HTML tag to render as container

bg-placeholder.desc: The list will show a background simulating scroll while rendering new list items. Requires a background color to be set on the virtual list or on its parent

scrollTarget.desc: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as scroll container instead of the root element of virtual list

default.desc: Customize how the items are rendered; Suggestion: QItem

index.desc: Item index in the options list

item.desc: Item data -- its value is taken from 'options' prop

scrollTo.desc: Scroll the list to the item with the specified index (0 based)

key.desc: The index of the list item (0 based)
